arts.ttl: 'He is doing very well': Enzo Maresca says he's impressed by 'fantastic' Chelsea star he's only started twice
arts.sum: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca has praised one player at the club who’s really impressing him despite his lack of starts. Enzo Maresca must have a...

arts.ttl: Joao Felix reacts to ‘kind of weird’ question
arts.sum: Felix is one of a host of fringe Chelsea stars seeking to take advantage of the club’s European games to try to win a more regular spot in the thinking of manager Enzo Maresca, who has used him as a bit-part player since he completed a €52 million move from Atletico Madrid in the summer. Chelsea attacker Joao Felix may only be 24 but he is a veteran of press conferences, yet ahead of the Blues’ clash against Panathinaikos in the UEFA Europa Conference League on Thursday, he still managed to be taken aback by a question that he described as “kind of weird”.

arts.ttl: 'Out of his shell': ESPN pundit claims £20m star has now become a leader after hiding at Chelsea
Chelsea deal on hold amid Man City case as West Ham plot to end star's nightmare
arts.sum: While City will argue that their 'victory' was good news for the Premier League clubs, it has left the Blues in a tricky situation where they don't know if they are breaking rules or not by getting a company connected with Todd Boehly or Clearlake Capital to sponsor their shirts. According to Manchester City's former legal advisor Stefan Borson, the Blues are in the dark surrounding whether or not an associated party can sponsor their shirt this season.

arts.ttl: Eclipsing Neymar, Brazil debut & finding his edge: Wonderkid Estevao Willian already looks primed to become a Chelsea star
arts.sum: “My biggest dream is to be the best player in the world," he said this month. The Brazilian will be heading to Chelsea next summer, after the Blues saw off some serious competition to sign the prodigious Palmeiras attacker in June for a massive £56 million ($73m) .

arts.sum: A number of key Chelsea names have been left behind in England ahead of tonight’s Conference League game against Panathinaikos. After dropping the likes of...

arts.ttl: Panathinaikos vs Chelsea: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Thursday's hosts, who sit sixth in the Greek top flight this season, started their campaign with a 1-1 draw at Bosnian side Borac on Matchday 1, while Chelsea topped Gent 4-2 in west London. His team have slipped to sixth in the Premier League, but there's a continental adventure to mitigate before Newcastle United visit Stamford Bridge this weekend.

arts.ttl: 'He's a top player': Joao Felix claims it's so easy playing alongside £52m Chelsea teammate
arts.sum: Chelsea star Joao Felix has delivered a glowing verdict on his club teammate ahead of Thursday’s match against Panathinaikos. The Blues are back in action...

arts.ttl: 'When I left': Joao Felix shares what he told his friends after 2023 Chelsea exit
arts.sum: This is now his second spell with the club.

arts.ttl: Chelsea have already completed two transfers to give Noni Madueke and Mykhailo Mudryk a problem
arts.sum: Speaking to football.london, Maresca said: "I really like Noni. Between Madueke ’s inconsistent performances and Chelsea ’s unprecedented turnover of players, the Englishman was linked with a move away from Stamford Bridge this summer.
